docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, March 20 (AP) -- Flory Van Donck of Belgium carded a two-under- par 69 today to regain the lead in the 90-hole international golf tournament with a 54-hole score of 205.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, March 20 (AP) -- Flory Van Donck of Belgium carded a two-under- par 69 today to regain the lead in the 90-hole international golf tournament with a 54-hole score of 205.

headline.main: VAN DONCK REGAINS LEAD; Belgian Golfer Cards a 69 for 205 in Montevideo Tourney

docs.snippet: Rates for foreign exchanges followed an irregular trend during the course of trading in the past week. British pound sterling and the Canadian dollar moved narrowly in a market that lacked the activity of the previous week.
docs.lead_paragraph: Rates for foreign exchanges followed an irregular trend during the course of trading in the past week. British pound sterling and the Canadian dollar moved narrowly in a market that lacked the activity of the previous week.

headline.main: FOREIGN EXCHANGE RATES; Week Ended March 19, 1954

docs.snippet: The northbound voyage of the 20,000 ton passenger liner Uruguay of the Moore-McCormack Lines will terminate at Baltimore next Monday, instead of continuing to New York. Indications are that the ship is slated for an indefinite lay-up.
docs.lead_paragraph: The northbound voyage of the 20,000 ton passenger liner Uruguay of the Moore-McCormack Lines will terminate at Baltimore next Monday, instead of continuing to New York. Indications are that the ship is slated for an indefinite lay-up.
docs.abstract: Moore-McCormack diverts liner Uruguay to Baltimore because of NY dock strike; to replace vessel with SS Brasil on S Amer run; indefinite lay-up seen

headline.main: Second Southern Ship Diverted; Uruguay Will Dock at Baltimore; Moore-McCormack Passenger Liner Is Due Monday -- Lay-Up Is Expected to Follow -- The Brazil Will Replace Her

docs.snippet: Mayor Wagner appealed yesterday to striking longshoremen to return at once to their jobs.
docs.lead_paragraph: Mayor Wagner appealed yesterday to striking longshoremen to return at once to their jobs.

headline.main: END OF PIER STRIKE URGED BY WAGNER TO HELP SAVE PORT; Take Jobs While They Last, He Warns Longshoremen, Citing Flight of Business

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, March 22 (AP) -- Flory Van Donck of Belgium won the Uruguayan international golf championship by eight strokes today with a 90-hole total of 345, fourteen under par over two different courses.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, March 22 (AP) -- Flory Van Donck of Belgium won the Uruguayan international golf championship by eight strokes today with a 90-hole total of 345, fourteen under par over two different courses.

headline.main: VAN DONCK VICTOR IN URUGUAY GOLF; Wins by Eight Strokes With 345 Total for 90 Holes -- Oliver Ties for Second

docs.snippet: It is understandable that of all the things that happened at the Tenth Inter-American Conference in Caracas, Venezuela, the announcement of the plans to release the Peruvian leader, Haya de la Torre, aroused the greatest emotion. The Haya case has...
docs.lead_paragraph: It is understandable that of all the things that happened at the Tenth Inter-American Conference in Caracas, Venezuela, the announcement of the plans to release the Peruvian leader, Haya de la Torre, aroused the greatest emotion. The Haya case has dragged on for more than five years and it has always been highly charged with emotion.

keywords.name: persons
keywords.value: HAYA DE LA TORRE, VICTOR RAUL

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: AMERICAN NATIONS AND WESTERN HEMISPHERE POSSESSIONS

docs.snippet: UNESCO begins coupon system to overcome currency barriers to students, teachers and research workers travel; 11 nations in plan
docs.abstract: UNESCO begins coupon system to overcome currency barriers to students, teachers and research workers travel; 11 nations in plan

headline.main: Global Travel Check Plan Is Launched by UNESCO

docs.snippet: SPARTANBURG, S. C., March 26 (AP) -- Mrs. Babe Didrikson Zaharias gave the younger pros and amateurs a lesson in golf today with a par-71 that was good for a three-stroke lead in the first round of the second annual Peach Blossom - Betsy Rawls...
docs.lead_paragraph: SPARTANBURG, S. C., March 26 (AP) -- Mrs. Babe Didrikson Zaharias gave the younger pros and amateurs a lesson in golf today with a par-71 that was good for a three-stroke lead in the first round of the second annual Peach Blossom - Betsy Rawls tournament.

docs.snippet: In the struggle for Europe, the Russians last week made a dramatic move. On Friday Moscow announced that it was granting full "sovereignty" to the East German People's Republic. The statement said East Germany would control its own "internal and...
docs.lead_paragraph: In the struggle for Europe, the Russians last week made a dramatic move. On Friday Moscow announced that it was granting full "sovereignty" to the East German People's Republic. The statement said East Germany would control its own "internal and external affairs."
